original_jd:
Job Description-

This role will blend business acumen with technical proficiency, requiring the ability to understand complex business processes and translate them into effective system configurations. You will be a key player in ensuring our systems accurately reflect business needs and operate efficiently. This position will focus heavily on the developing new processes with technical solutions with the vehicle configuration space. The position will utilize ML and AI to quickly develop solutions.

 • Collaborate with stakeholders across various departments to understand business needs, gather detailed requirements, and document them clearly and concisely using various techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows). 

• Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend. This includes, but is not limited to:

 • Developing and maintaining configuration specifications.

 • Creating and modifying data mappings and integrations.

 • Implementing and testing new configurations.

 • Troubleshooting and resolving configuration-related issues. 

• Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement. This may involve querying databases, generating reports, and visualizing data using appropriate tools. 

• Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and best practices. 

• Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected. Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT). 

• Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps. 

• Work closely with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Skills Required:

-Strong analytical and problem-solving skills. -Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills. -Ability to translate complex technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.

Skills Preferred:

-Java experience -SQL experience

Experience Required:

-ML experience and implementation experience

Experience Preferred:

-Experience with Agile methodologies is a plus. -Experience with vehicle configuration is a plus.
enhanced_versions:
Role Overview:
This role is a critical bridge between business needs and technical implementation, requiring a unique blend of business acumen, analytical thinking, and technical proficiency. As a key player in our organization, you will be responsible for understanding complex business processes and translating them into effective system configurations that drive efficiency and accuracy. Your focus will be on developing new processes and solutions within the vehicle configuration space, leveraging machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to deliver innovative and responsive technical solutions.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across various departments to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure clear understanding of needs.
- Translate business requirements into technical configurations within our [mention specific system] backend, including developing and maintaining configuration specifications, creating and modifying data mappings and integrations, implementing and testing new configurations, and troubleshooting/resolving configuration-related issues.
- Analyze existing data to identify trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools.
- Identify opportunities to streamline business processes and improve system efficiency through configuration changes and the application of best practices.
- Thoroughly test configurations to ensure they meet requirements and function as expected, and participate in user acceptance testing (UAT).
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps.
- Work collaboratively with developers, IT support, and other stakeholders to ensure smooth implementation and ongoing support of system configurations.

Required Skills:
- Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex problems and develop effective solutions.
- Excellent communication, interpersonal, and collaboration skills, enabling you to translate technical information into easily understandable terms for non-technical audiences.
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and utilize data visualization tools to uncover insights.

Preferred Skills:
- Experience with Java programming language, providing a solid technical foundation for system configuration and integration.
- Familiarity with SQL, allowing you to efficiently interact with and manipulate data within our [mention specific system] backend.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated experience in implementing and configuring machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, showcasing your ability to leverage cutting-edge technologies to drive process improvements.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience with Agile methodologies, enabling you to work effectively in a fast-paced, iterative environment.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, providing a deeper understanding of the domain and context for your work.

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL
- Data analysis and visualization tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be part of a collaborative, cross-functional team, requiring strong communication and the ability to work effectively with stakeholders from various departments.
- A results-driven mindset and a commitment to continuous improvement are essential, as you will be expected to identify and implement solutions that enhance business efficiency and system performance.
- The work environment is fast-paced and dynamic, with a focus on delivering high-quality, innovative solutions in a timely manner.

Role Overview:
As a technical configuration specialist, this role is pivotal in ensuring our [mention specific system] accurately reflects and supports our organization's evolving business needs. You will be responsible for translating complex business processes into efficient technical configurations, leveraging your deep understanding of system capabilities and your ability to collaborate effectively with stakeholders. Your focus will be on developing new configuration-driven solutions within the vehicle configuration space, with a strong emphasis on utilizing machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to drive continuous improvement.

Key Responsibilities:
- Engage with stakeholders across the organization to thoroughly understand their business requirements, gather detailed specifications, and document them using industry-standard techniques such as user stories, use cases, and process flows.
- Analyze the existing [mention specific system] configuration and data structures, identifying opportunities to optimize performance, enhance functionality, and improve data integrity.
- Develop and maintain detailed configuration specifications, ensuring they align with business needs and adhere to best practices.
- Implement and test new configurations, collaborating with developers and IT support to ensure seamless integration and functionality.
- Troubleshoot and resolve configuration-related issues, providing timely and effective support to end-users.
- Analyze system data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, leveraging database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools.
- Propose and implement configuration-driven solutions to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency.
- Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that configurations meet requirements and function as expected.
- Maintain comprehensive documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex challenges and develop effective, data-driven solutions.
- Strong communication and interpersonal abilities, enabling you to collaborate effectively with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds and translate technical information into easily understandable terms.
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and utilize data visualization tools to uncover insights.

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming, providing a solid technical foundation for system configuration and integration.
- Familiarity with SQL, allowing you to efficiently interact with and manipulate data within the [mention specific system] backend.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated expertise in implementing and configuring machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, showcasing your ability to leverage cutting-edge technologies to drive process improvements.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment, with a proven track record of delivering high-quality, iterative solutions.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, providing a deeper understanding of the domain and context for your work.

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL
- Data analysis and visualization tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be part of a collaborative, cross-functional team, requiring strong communication skills and the ability to work effectively with stakeholders from various departments.
- You will be expected to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, with a focus on continuous improvement and the ability to adapt quickly to changing business needs.
- A results-driven mindset and a commitment to delivering high-quality, innovative solutions are essential to succeed in this role.

Role Overview:
This technical configuration role is a critical link between our organization's business objectives and the effective implementation of our [mention specific system]. You will be responsible for translating complex business requirements into efficient and scalable technical configurations, ensuring our systems accurately reflect and support evolving operational needs. With a strong focus on the vehicle configuration space, you will leverage your expertise in machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) to develop innovative solutions that drive continuous process improvements.

Key Responsibilities:
- Collaborate closely with stakeholders across the organization to gather detailed business requirements, document them using industry-standard techniques (e.g., user stories, use cases, process flows), and ensure a clear understanding of their needs.
- Analyze the existing [mention specific system] configuration and data structures, identifying opportunities to optimize performance, enhance functionality, and improve data integrity.
- Develop and maintain comprehensive configuration specifications, ensuring they align with business requirements and adhere to best practices.
- Implement and test new configurations, working closely with developers and IT support to ensure seamless integration and functionality.
- Troubleshoot and resolve configuration-related issues, providing timely and effective support to end-users.
- Analyze system data to uncover trends, inefficiencies, and areas for improvement, utilizing database querying, reporting, and data visualization tools.
- Propose and implement configuration-driven solutions to streamline business processes and enhance system efficiency.
- Participate in user acceptance testing (UAT) to validate that configurations meet requirements and function as expected.
- Maintain detailed documentation of system configurations, processes, and troubleshooting steps to support ongoing maintenance and future enhancements.
- Serve as a technical subject matter expert, providing guidance and training to cross-functional teams on system capabilities and configuration best practices.

Required Skills:
- Exceptional analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to break down complex challenges and develop effective, data-driven solutions.
- Excellent communication and interpersonal abilities, enabling you to collaborate effectively with stakeholders from diverse backgrounds and translate technical information into easily understandable terms.
- Proficiency in data analysis, including the ability to query databases, generate reports, and utilize data visualization tools to uncover insights and drive decision-making.
- Strong project management skills, with the ability to prioritize tasks, manage multiple initiatives, and ensure timely delivery of high-quality solutions.

Preferred Skills:
- Hands-on experience with Java programming, providing a solid technical foundation for system configuration and integration.
- Familiarity with SQL, allowing you to efficiently interact with and manipulate data within the [mention specific system] backend.

Required Experience:
- Demonstrated expertise in implementing and configuring machine learning (ML) and artificial intelligence (AI) solutions, showcasing your ability to leverage cutting-edge technologies to drive process improvements and enhance system performance.

Preferred Experience:
- Experience working in an Agile environment, with a proven track record of delivering high-quality, iterative solutions that meet evolving business needs.
- Familiarity with vehicle configuration processes and systems, providing a deeper understanding of the domain and context for your work.

Tools & Technologies:
- [Mention specific system] backend
- SQL
- Data analysis and visualization tools
- Machine learning and artificial intelligence platforms
- Project management tools

Work Environment & Expectations:
- This role will be part of a highly collaborative, cross-functional team, requiring excellent communication skills and the ability to work effectively with stakeholders from various departments.
- You will be expected to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, with a focus on continuous improvement and the ability to adapt quickly to changing business requirements.
- A results-driven mindset, a commitment to delivering high-quality, innovative solutions, and a strong attention to detail are essential to succeed in this role.
